title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\SuggestSmartRepliesRequest
name: SuggestSmartRepliesRequest
description:
The request message for [Participants.SuggestSmartReplies][google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.Participants.SuggestSmartReplies].

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.SuggestSmartRepliesRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parent
params.description: Required. The name of the participant to fetch suggestion for. Format: projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/conversations/<Conversation ID>/participants/<Participant ID>.

params.name: data.current_text_input
params.description: The current natural language text segment to compile suggestion for. This provides a way for user to get follow up smart reply suggestion after a smart reply selection, without sending a text message.

params.name: data.latest_message
params.description: The name of the latest conversation message to compile suggestion for. If empty, it will be the latest message of the conversation. Format: projects/<Project ID>/locations/<Location ID>/conversations/<Conversation ID>/messages/<Message ID>.

params.name: data.context_size
params.description: Max number of messages prior to and including [latest_message] to use as context when compiling the suggestion. By default 20 and at most 50.
